Choe Thae Bok Meets Cuban Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with new Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Galego Montano who paid a courtesy call on him today.

Delegation of State Academy of Sciences Leaves for China 
   Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Academy of Sciences headed by its Vice-President Ri Song Uk left here Wednesday to participate in the Northeast Asia Ultra Modern Technology Expo for 2007 to be held in China.

articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok se reune con nuevo embajador cubano
   Pyongyang, 19 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, departio este miercoles con el nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Cuba acreditado en Corea, Jose Manuel Galego Montano, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.
